casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Maechel Shawn PATTERSON No. 597P01-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Maechel Shawn Patterson, for Patterson, Maechel Shawn. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 28th of April 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
